meanings.definition: The highest or lowest point; the peak or nadir.
meanings.sent1: The hiker reached the extrema of the mountain, feeling accomplished.
meanings.sent2: The extrema of the roller coaster was the thrilling drop.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the extrema of the dance-off was when Grandma busted out her breakdancing moves.
meanings.sent4: The storm reached its extrema, unleashing torrential rain and fierce winds.
meanings.sent5: The extrema of the movie was the heart-stopping car chase scene.

meanings.definition: The most extreme or intense point or degree.
meanings.sent1: The heatwave reached its extrema, causing record-breaking temperatures.
meanings.sent2: The extrema of her excitement was evident in her wide smile.
meanings.sent3: The extrema of the flavor in the spicy curry made his taste buds tingle.
meanings.sent4: In the heat of the argument, their emotions reached an extrema.
meanings.sent5: The tension in the room reached an extrema, making everyone uneasy.
